Rights of Persons Having Lower Preference
When a person having preferred entitlement dies, forfeits entitlement, or otherwise becomes disqualified before receiving and negotiating the check for their share of the accrued benefit, pay the next person entitled based on relationship or reimbursement, if a claim is timely filed.
